title: RaceReady Expands International Presence with New Partnerships
author: Business Development
excerpt: Strategic partnerships in Asia and Europe will bring RaceReady's innovative event management solutions to new international markets and racing series.
body: RaceReady is expanding its international presence through strategic partnerships in Asia and Europe, bringing the platform's innovative event management solutions to new markets and racing series. The expansion represents significant growth for the Australian-developed technology.

New partnerships include major racing organizations in Japan, Malaysia, the United Kingdom, and Germany. These collaborations will see RaceReady's platform adapted for local market requirements while maintaining its core functionality and user experience.

"International expansion has always been part of our vision," explained RaceReady International Director Sarah Kim. "Motorsport is a global community, and our platform can help organizers worldwide deliver better events and experiences for competitors and spectators."

The international rollout includes localization for multiple languages and currencies, integration with regional timing and scoring systems, and adaptation to local regulatory requirements. Local support teams are being established in each new market.
The first international implementations are scheduled to begin in early 2025, with several major championship series already committed to using the RaceReady platform for their upcoming seasons.

seo.metaDescription: Strategic partnerships in Asia and Europe will bring RaceReady's innovative event management solutions to new international markets and racing series.
